name: Pepper Meme
description: $PEPPER is a memecoin project that blends community engagement, gamification, and education to reestablish what memecoins are. For far too long, this bull run has been infested with pump and dump schemes and shady tokenomics. We believe the best way to change that is through education, not regulation. The Pepper Academy will create a bridge for the knowledge gap that allows bad actors to profit. We also want to tap back into the fun side of memes, bring back the old spirit. We aim to do this through our own $PEPPER branded games, real community engagement, long term partnerships, etc. $PEPPER is a memecoin, but more importantly: a brand.
